title: Project-Based Cloud Learning Workshop for Human-Computer Interface Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage experience and intermediate-level language domain expertise
context.additional_context: Environment where learners in managerial/leadership roles execute real-work-linked projects using cloud-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can elaborate a three-stage or more HCI project design process per team using cloud-based collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace).
Learners can develop a quantitative/qualitative indicator system of five or more metrics for user experience (UX) evaluation.
Learners can analyze problems in HCI design using critical thinking frameworks (CTS/CTD) and propose improvements based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
